property.name: consent_text_6
property.default: The MindCrowd Research Study
property.label: The MindCrowd Research Study

property.name: consent_text_7
property.default: Information and Frequently Asked Questions
property.label: Information and Frequently Asked Questions

property.name: consent_text_8
property.default: MindCrowd is a scientific research study. To participate, please read the following information and agree by checking the box below. Press the 'I agree' button to continue.
property.label: I agree button to continue

property.name: consentExpanded_text_11
property.default: I have read this form, or it has been read to me. This form describes the purpose and details of this research study. I understand that if I have questions, I should contact the study coordinator at 602-343-8653 (24 hours) or mhuentelman@tgen.org or before I consent to participate in this study.
property.label: Checking Confirm

property.name: consentExpanded_text_12
property.default: I consent to participate in this research study.
property.label: Checking Confirm

property.name: consentExpanded01
property.default: Taking part in this research is voluntary. You may decide not to participate, or you may leave the study at any time. Your decision will not result in any penalty or loss of benefits to which you are otherwise entitled.
property.label: consentExpanded01

property.name: consentExpanded02
property.default: If you have any questions, concerns, or complaints or think this research has hurt you, talk to the research team at the phone number(s) listed in this document.
property.label: consentExpanded02

property.name: consentExpanded03
property.default: This consent information sheet addendum has more information about the research study. It may add to or change the information in the consent form you signed at the start of this study.
property.label: consentExpanded03

property.name: consentExpanded04
property.default: You are being asked to participate in a research study. Please read the following information before agreeing to participate.
property.label: consentExpanded04

property.name: consentExpanded05
property.default: This research study is being conducted by Dr. Matt Huentelman at the Translational Genomics Research Institute (TGen). The purpose of this study is to understand how the brain ages.
property.label: consentExpanded05

property.name: consentExpanded06
property.default: What will I have to do?
property.label: consentExpanded06

property.name: consentExpanded07
property.default: You will be asked to create an account and complete several online brain tests. We may send you requests to complete these online tests several times during your participation in MindCrowd.
property.label: consentExpanded07

property.name: consentExpanded08
property.default: Are there any risks?
property.label: consentExpanded08

property.name: consentExpanded10
property.default: Will I get paid?
property.label: consentExpanded10

property.name: consentExpanded11
property.default: You will receive $100 for the completion of all brain tests. To qualify, you must also participate in our dried blood sample or APOE sub-studies.
property.label: consentExpanded11

property.name: consentExpanded12
property.default: Does it cost me anything to participate?
property.label: consentExpanded12

property.name: consentExpanded14
property.default: Will you share my study data?
property.label: consentExpanded14

property.name: consentExpanded15
property.default: Sharing research data with other scientists is an important part of the research process and helps advance scientific progress. We will share de-identified data from this study with other researchers to help further research into the human brain.
property.label: consentExpanded15

property.name: consentExpanded16
property.default: Will you share my personal information with other people?
property.label: consentExpanded16

property.name: consentExpanded17
property.default: No, we will not share your personal information without your permission. If you consent to participate in a MindCrowd collaborative study (or have previously done so), we may share or receive identifiable data such as your name or email address with our collaborative partners. Your information could also be shared with the FDA and the IRB overseeing this study. This would only be done to link your study data.
property.label: consentExpanded17

property.name: consentExpanded18
property.default: To help protect your privacy, we have obtained a Certificate of Confidentiality from the National Institutes of Health. This means researchers may refuse to give out study information that identifies you. For example, if there were a court order requesting your study records, TGen would not give out information that identifies you, unless you have consented for this use. The Certificate does permit TGen to disclose your information when:
property.label: consentExpanded18

property.name: consentExpanded19
property.default: Required by Federal, State, or local laws. This excludes instances of Federal, State, or local civil, criminal, administrative, legislative, or other proceedings;
property.label: consentExpanded19

property.name: consentExpanded20
property.default: You have consented to the disclosure, including for your medical treatment;
property.label: consentExpanded20

property.name: consentExpanded21
property.default: Done as part of other approved research studies.
property.label: consentExpanded21

property.name: consentExpanded22
property.default: A Certificate of Confidentiality does not prevent you or someone else, like a member of your family, from voluntarily sharing information about yourself or your involvement in this research. If you want your research information released to an insurer, medical care provider, or any other person not connected with the research, you must provide consent to allow the researchers to release it.
property.label: consentExpanded22

property.name: consentExpanded23
property.default: What if I change my mind and don't want to participate in the study anymore?
property.label: consentExpanded23

property.name: consentExpanded24
property.default: Your participation is completely voluntary. You do not have to participate and you may stop at any time. Your decision will not result in any penalty to you. Please contact the Study Coordinator at crc@tgen.org to withdraw from the study.
property.label: consentExpanded24

property.name: consentExpanded25
property.default: What if I have questions or comments?
property.label: consentExpanded25

property.name: consentExpanded26
property.default: If you have any questions, concerns or complaints about this research, you may contact Dr. Matt Huentelman at mhuentelman@tgen.org or 602-343-8653 (24 hours).
property.label: consentExpanded26

property.name: consentExpanded27
property.default: Will you contact me in the future?
property.label: consentExpanded27

property.name: consentExpanded28
property.default: We may contact you in the future via email to offer you to participate in new scientific research studies. Participation in any of our studies is completely voluntary.
property.label: consentExpanded28

property.name: consentExpanded29
property.default: What if I have questions about my rights in this research, have a complaint, or want to report a problem to someone besides the researcher?
property.label: consentExpanded29

property.name: consentExpanded30
property.default: You may contact WCG IRB at:
property.label: consentExpanded30

property.name: consentExpanded31
property.default: 1019 39th Avenue SE Suite 120
property.label: consentExpanded31

property.name: consentExpanded32
property.default: Puyallup, Washington 98374-2115
property.label: consentExpanded32

property.name: consentExpanded33
property.default: Telephone: 855-818-2289
property.label: consentExpanded33

property.name: consentExpanded34
property.default: E-mail: researchquestions@wcgirb.com
property.label: consentExpanded34

property.name: consentExpanded35
property.default: WCG IRB is a group of people who perform independent review of research.
property.label: consentExpanded35

property.name: consentExpanded36
property.default: For questions, concerns, suggestions, complaints that are not being addressed by the research team, or in case of research-related harm, please contact the TGen Office of Research Compliance at
property.label: consentExpanded36

property.name: DBS_text_85
property.default: I Consent
property.label: DBS_text_85

property.name: DBS_text_93
property.default: I Decline
property.label: DBS_text_93

property.name: DBS_text_88
property.default: Please Complete the Required Fields.
property.label: DBS_text_88
